programme.desc: Doug Bennet e Steve Forrest permaneceram amigos, mesmo depois que Steve deixou o FBI. Mas, para reuni-los, est Garret, um perigoso ex-presidirio em cujo caso os dois policiais trabalharam juntos.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: Outubro Negro, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vtimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trs do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo.

programme.title: O Preo da Traio, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher chamada Allison Pond encontrada morta no deserto perto de Los Angeles.Um detetive investiga o caso e descobre que ela poderia estar ligada a um programa militar secreto.Porm, ele tambm guarda segredos: ela era sua amante.

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de saber que s tem 90 minutos de vida, por conta de um aneurisma no crebro, um homem infeliz quer fazer as pazes com todos aqueles que foram magoados por ele.

programme.title: Camp (Lio de Vida), (2021, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Aps se inscrever em um programa de monitores de um acampamento filantrpico de vero, um consultor de investimentos tenta ajudar um menino de dez anos de idade a entender o significado do amor incondicional.

programme.title: ltimos Dias no Deserto, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Durante os 40 dias de jejum e orao no deserto, Jesus luta contra o Diabo pelo destino de uma famlia em crise.

programme.title: Um Anjo em Nossas Vidas, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Quando um criminoso insensvel e doente cruza o caminho de uma menina cheia de f, uma segunda chance surge para tocar o corao durante a temporada de festas.

programme.title: Prova de Fogo, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: No trabalho o Capito Caleb vive pelo velho ditado dos bombeiros: Nunca deixe o seu companheiro para trs. Em casa, ele vive pelas prprias regras. Agora Caleb ter o seu trabalho mais rduo, resgatar o corao de sua esposa.

programme.title: Carta Para Deus, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Um menino que luta contra o cncer escreve cartas para Deus, tocando vidas em sua vizinhana e inspirando esperana entre todos com quem entra em contato.

programme.title: A Guerra de Anna, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma menina de seis anos chamada Anna tem toda a famlia assassinada em uma execuo em massa de judeus. Por um milagre, ela sobrevive e passa as prximas centenas de dias escondida na chamin em desuso de um comandante nazista.

programme.title: The Music of Silence, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme biogrfico sobre o tenor e msico italiano Andrea Bocelli. Apesar de ter nascido com um grave problema de viso que terminar em cegueira, Bocelli supera todos os tipos de obstculos, guiado por grandes ambies em relao sua paixo, a msica.

programme.title: Grandes Olhos, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Pintora e defensora das causas feministas, a norte-americana Margaret Keane enfrenta um de seus maiores desafios ao levar ao tribunal o prprio marido. Em um perodo em que o reconhecimento de um trabalho feminino era difcil.

programme.desc: Sarada duvida que Sakura seja sua me biolgica, e se junta a Cho-Cho, que est prestes a sair em uma jornada em busca dos seus "pais verdadeiros".

programme.sub-title: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!

programme.title: Naruto: O Selo Quebrado
programme.desc: Naruto e Sasuke so atacados dentro dos Espelhos Cristal de Gelo de Haku. Durante a batalha, Sasuke percebe o poder do seu prprio Sharingan e comea a desviar dos ataques de Haku. Haku decide acabar com ele. Sasuke usa seu corpo para proteger Naruto...

programme.title: Naruto: Passado Branco, Ambio Escondida
programme.desc: Naruto finalmente explode! Sua raiva por Haku libera o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. O chakra de Naruto est to intenso que at Kakashi e Zabuza, que esto lutando distncia, percebem. Haku incapaz de fazer algo diante do poder secreto de Naruto.

programme.title: Naruto: As Armas Conhecidas Como Shinobi
programme.desc: Haku pede a Naruto que acabe com ele. Naruto questiona a filosofia de Haku sobre existir apenas para lutar e ganhar. Enquanto isso, a batalha entre Kakashi e Zabuza chega ao clmax. Com a vitria ao alcance, Kakashi libera sua manobra mais devastadora.

programme.title: o primeiro dia dos rapazes no quarto ano e eles no gostaram nada de sua nova professora. Ento, eles pedem ajuda aos vizinhos de Kyle para transformar a cadeira de rodas de Timmy em uma mquina do tempo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman ensina aos rapazes sueu novo fichrio ultra moderno da Trapper Keeper, e melhor que o de Kyle. Mais tarde, no nibus, um homem supostamente chamado Bill Cosby mostra um enorme interesse pelo tal fichrio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os alunos do quarto ano esto participando da pea "Hellen Keller, a milagrosa". O nico objetivo deles conseguir ir um pouco melhor que os alunos do jardim de infncia, que segundo Butters, preparam um show espetacular.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Todos acham que Cartman est muito gordo e decidem envi-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny est topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva s mais diversas insanidades.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais no deixam. Cartman sugere que ele v polcia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes esto tristes pois o senhor Hanckey anda bastante ocupado com sua famlia e no consegue compartilhar seu esprito natalino pela cidade. Ento eles tem uma ideia para reviver o esprito natalino na cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Scott Tenorman um rapaz do oitavo ano que engana Cartman ao vender seus pentelhos. Agora, ele far o que for preciso para recuperar o seu dinheiro. Participao especial: Radiohead.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes conhecem um novo rapaz deficiente chamado Jimmy no clube de exploradores, e Timmy fica com cimes. Por outro lado, os pais no conseguem acreditar que Gay Al seja o lder destes pequenos exploradores.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: Funcionrios de uma empresa vo a um refgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trs do lugar.

programme.title: Tempestade de Gelo, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma tempestade de inverno atinge a Carolina do Norte com a menor temperatura j registrada na histria, os climatologistas comeam uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar o mximo de vidas possveis antes que o pas inteiro vire gelo.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos, (2023, Action)

programme.desc: In this comic gem from the legendary Billy Wilder and his long-time writing partner I.A.L. Diamond, Dean Martin is a famous singer targeted by two would-be songwriters who encourage a waitress (Kim Novak) to coerce Dino into a song-buying mood.

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny, (1966, Musical)

programme.title: Clambake, (1967, Musical)
programme.desc: The king of rock 'n' roll, Elvis Presley, is as a lonely million-heir who gives up his fortune and trades identities with a water ski instructor to learn about life from the bottom up in this musical romp! Bill Bixby and Shelley Fabares also star.

programme.title: King Creole, (1958, Musical)

programme.desc: Elvis adopts an on-screen persona he knows well in real life-a singin' G.I. in West Germany. Eager to open a stateside nightclub after his hitch in khakis, he takes part in a wager to raise the dough he needs.

programme.desc: His mother (Angela Lansbury) expects him to climb the corporate ladder. But Elvis would rather wear an aloha shirt than a white collar, so he goes to work as a tour guide. Lucky Elvis: his first customers are a car full of cuties.

programme.desc: The film probes the psyche of the young soldiers who fought in Vietnam. Their camaraderie, their struggle for survival amid terrifying violence and madness of combat.

programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: The Condemned, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy TV producer and taken to an island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers.

programme.desc: A bounty hunter becomes the hunted, in a high-stakes contest for survival. WWE superstar Randy Orton and Eric Roberts star in this explosive follow-up to The Condemned.

programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Naruto is incensed at the way Tsunade disrespects the position of Hokage and challenges her to a fight.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto practices hard so he can win the necklace from Tsunade. Meanwhile, Tsunade is in a dilemma over Orochimarus offer.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Gripped by the desire to see Nawaki and Dan, Tsunade almost succumbs to Orochimarus tempting offer.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Orochimaru and Kabuto use a summoning jutsu to call forth a giant snake. Still drugged and unable to fully use his chakra, Jiraiya summons little Gamakichi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Narutos ninja way is to never go back on his word. Naruto is seriously injured by Kabuto and hovers on the verge of death.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru all release their summoning jutsu. And a fierce battle begins.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade, Naruto, and the others start heading back to the Leaf Village where Tsunade will formally become the Fifth Hokage. At Tsunade's urging, they stop at a town with hot springs.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to find a path other than that of a shinobi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee hesitates when Tsunade asks him whether he will quit pursuing the path of a ninja or choose to undergo a risky surgery with only a fifty percent chance of success.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After being advised by Tsunade to quit the path of the shinobi, Lee recalls his first meeting with his teacher Guy.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their great traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Despite interference from Aoi, Idate continues his run. Idate still trusts no one, and its revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idates older brother was the proctor who posed the tenth question.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Crime)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Original Gangstas, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A fast-paced Action-Thriller about adults living in a crime-ridden area. They are tired of being bullied, and take matters into their own hands to rid the town of the criminals.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Marlowe, (2023, Crime)
programme.desc: Marlowe, a gripping thriller set in 1939 LA. Hard-boiled private eye, Philip Marlowe, is hired to find the lover of a glamorous heiress. Unexpectedly, Marlowe finds himself embroiled in a deadly mystery that he's determined to either solve or die trying.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Regarding Henry, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Henry Turner is a New York lawyer who needs to win at any cost. But a single gunshot brings Henrys fast-track rise to a dead stop, leaving him incapacitated and with no memory of the life he used to lead.

programme.title: Before I Go To Sleep, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

programme.title: Memento, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (1962, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Sinatra, Laurence Harvey, Janet Leigh, and Angela Lansbury headline an all-star cast in this daring thriller rife with political intrigue, mental manipulation, and a diabolical plot that may lead to the highest levels of the government.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: As the entire nation watches the presidential campaign hurtle towards Election Day, one soldier races to uncover the conspiracy behind it - a conspiracy that seeks to destroy democracy itself.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio leads a phenomenal cast in this thrilling tale of majesty and Musketeers. When the excesses of France's arrogant King Louis XIV begin to threaten his subjects' very lives, the legendary Musketeers reunite to save their country!

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: The Boys From Brazil, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.title: Death On The Nile, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: In the Royal Palace, Viola, Luffy, and the Toy Soldier have hidden themselves outside Doflamingo's chamber, only to have more enemies approach from behind, leaving them surrounded! Meanwhile, Franky is knocked out cold by the Navy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Operation Failed! Usoland the Hero Dies?!

programme.title: Toys all across Dressrosa regain their human form, a flood of forgotten memories return, and Kyros launches a long overdue attack on the villainous tyrant Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legend is Back! Kyros' All-out Blow!

programme.title: Kyros finally taking down Doflamingo leaves Doflamingo's clan shocked! Meanwhile at the Colosseum, Rebecca gets her memories of her loving father Kyros back, and Sabo makes a move to end the championship battle by blowing up the whole ring!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fire Fist Strikes! The Flare-Flare Fruit Power Returns!

programme.title: Luffy hurries to free Law, but with their pirate alliance dissolved, will Law still see Luffy as an ally? Meanwhile, Usopp has convinced his newfound followers to destroy the factory! Doflamingo's defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dashing onto the Scene! The Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army - Sabo!

programme.title: The mystery of Doflamingo's return from the dead is revealed! But there isn't much time to ponder how it happened, as his plan to silence the country of Dressrosa unfolds, spelling doom for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Trap! A Dressrosa Extermination Plan!

programme.title: As the people of Dressrosa see their friends and loved ones slaughter each other under the manipulation of Doflamingo, memories of 10 years ago rush back, and the truth of that event becomes clear. Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The 500 Million Berry Man! Target: Usoland!

programme.title: Doflamingo and Fujitora's agreement to not engage each other lasts for the moment - meaning all eyes are turned towards taking down the Straw Hats and claiming the rewards! And as Luffy starts heading to the Royal Palace, Fujitora stands in his way!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Breaking through Enemy Lines! Luffy and Zoro Launch the Counter-Attack!

programme.title: Robin, Usopp, the Tontattas and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo's deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin'emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!

programme.title: With Luffy & the others recovering from Pica's attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao and Elizabello successfully break Pica's giant arm but the rock giant is unfazed and starts throwing even more destructive punches at Luffy and his band of unwanted collaborators! Meanwhile, Navy Admiral Fujitora moves into action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Steady Progress! Luffys Army vs. Pica!

programme.title: Luffy and Moocy fast approach the showdown with Doflamingo - while the others with a beef against him continue to tag along. Meanwhile, Violet finds the key to Law's handcuffs, and Rebecca pledges to deliver it to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Shocking Confession! Law's Soulful Vow!

programme.title: Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through Doflamingo's guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!

programme.title: Luffy cuts a lucky break as Kelly Funk shows him a shortcut to the Palace! But all may not be as it seems... Meanwhile, Franky and Zoro are locked in one-on-one duels, while Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo enlist the help of the Tontattas.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Gets Caught in a Trap!

programme.title: Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Great Escape! Luffy's Tide-turning Elephant Gun!

programme.title: The Tontattas locate their captive comrades and seem to be able to get the message to them - the prison break is on! Meanwhile, heavy-hitters from the Colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks towards a unified plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A United Front! Luffy's Breakthrough to the Victory!

programme.title: Hidden far underground, Kin'emon finds his old friend Kanjuro whose powers allow the two to, quickly, but not elegantly, escape to the surface! Meanwhile, Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Second Samurai! Evening Shower Kanjuro Appears!

programme.title: The Tontattas are in full revolt! But can they keep their wits about them long enough to make it out? Meanwhile, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Seor Pink.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard-Fought Battle Against Pica! Zoro's Deadly Attack!

programme.title: Franky finally makes it into the factory and the Tontattas are reunited with their captive friends! But Princess Mansherry is nowhere to be found. Factory manager Kuween becomes irate when ignored and launches an attack on Franky.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Little People's Princess! Captive Mansherry!

programme.title: Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo draw closer to the Flower Field on the fourth level of the Royal Palace plateau, but a sudden attack by Gladius' exploding spheres sends Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling towards the level below.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Invincible! A Gruesome Army of Headcracker Dolls!

programme.title: Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, but unfortunately finds company there that is less than friendly! Meanwhile, Bartolomeo pushes himself to the limit in order to help Luffy advance, but does he leave himself vulnerable in the process?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Risking Their Lives! Luffy is the Trump Card for Victory!

programme.title: Diamante has Rebecca pinned and completely overpowered. If only the Soldier-san of her youth were able to protect her! Meanwhile, Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tearful Reunion! Rebecca and Kyros!

programme.title: Usopp uses Viola's Clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take Sugar out! But the slightest hesitation now will spell disaster, and the end of Luffy! Luckily for the Straw Hats, Usopp's ammunition has been specially designed for this situation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Shot One Kill! The Man Who Will Save Dressrosa!

programme.title: The final showdown with Doflamingo begins, but the Warlord still has several tricks up his sleeve - including turning one of Luffy's own friends against him! Meanwhile Franky and Seor Pink are in a standoff to find out who is the coolest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Erupts! Luffy and Law's Ultimate Stratagem!

programme.title: All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; but the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora's true intention
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Noble Family! The True Identity of Doflamingo!

programme.title: With Fujitora's stalemate arousing suspicion in the Navy ranks, Law and Luffy stand seconds away from execution at the hand of Doflamingo! But before he dispatches them both, he shares the secret of his sway over the Celestial Dragons!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Ultimate Power! The Secret of the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The horrible secret of Flevance, the White Town, is revealed, giving clues to Law's traumatic past! A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to kill Corazon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad Memories! Law, the Boy from the White Town!

programme.title: Law's attack on Corazon looks less successful than he thought! And after he's accepted into the Doflamingo Family, Corazon's mysterious silence hides a fact that may save Law's life - and a hidden danger Law must face in Doflamingo himself!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Celestial Dragon! Doffy's Stormy Past!

programme.title: Things grow stranger for Law as he learns the secret behind why Corazon feigns being mute! But the mysterious Corazon's actions are only beginning to baffle Law as he takes him on a journey to cure his White Lead Disease.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Rocky Road! Law and Corazon's Journey of Life!

programme.title: Corazon's double-dealing with the Navy raises suspicions both with Doflamingo and Law. But all that is secondary as Corazon finally has a chance to grab the Op-Op Fruit during a staged handoff arranged by the Government.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time is Ticking Down! Seize the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The Op-Op Fruit is in Corazon's hands! But the price he paid to get it might be too high... When Law goes for help, unfortunate coincidences intervene and leave the two vulnerable! Meanwhile, Doflamingo and his clan finally land at Minion Island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Moment of Resolution! Corazon's Farewell Smile!

programme.title: Doflamingo & his Family begin to zero in on Corazon and Law's whereabouts, but Corazon has a plan to hide Law long enough to let him escape, even if that means sacrificing his own life. A chain of lucky coincidences allows the plan to be set into motion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Advance, Law! The Kindhearted Man's Final Fight!

programme.title: Violet runs down the status of the open battles raging in Dressrosa - the Straw Hats, the Tontattas, the executives of the Doflamingo Family - all of them clash around the island, but it's Law's revelation to Doflamingo that moves the action forward!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato, (2004)

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) and a narcotics cop (Vanessa L. Williams) track a sociopath out to kill a woman who can testify that he committed murder.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: Disturbia (2007)
programme.desc: Under house arrest, a troubled youth (Shia LaBeouf) is unsure if his neighbor (David Morse) is really a serial killer or if his suspicions are the result of a captive and overactive imagination.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 2 (1997)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: Branded a traitor, an elite intelligence agent (Tom Cruise) investigates a failed Prague mission to retrieve a computer disk.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II (2000)
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called Chimera.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III (2006)
programme.desc: Now a trainer for IMF recruits, agent Ethan Hunt squares off against the toughest foe he has ever faced, a ruthless arms and information broker.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Ghost Protocol (2011)
programme.desc: The IMF is shut down when its implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organizations name.

programme.title: Major League (1989)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland teams new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Trading Places (1983)
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker (Dan Aykroyd) and a street hustler (Eddie Murphy).

programme.title: Erotic Obsession (2017)
programme.desc: Mandy thinks she has found the perfect roommate in her coworker, Michele. But when an innocent comment is misinterpreted by Michele, things quickly escalate from platonic roommates to full on infatuation.

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption (2010)
programme.desc: Uri Boyka is an inmate trapped in the toughest prison in the world. He is ready to make his comeback in a lethal boxing competition for a shot at freedom.

programme.title: Dont Knock Twice (2016)
programme.desc: A mother looking to reconnect with her estranged daughter attracts the attention of a demonic witch.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: Branded a traitor, an elite intelligence agent (Tom Cruise) investigates a failed Prague mission to retrieve a computer disk.

programme.title: The Martian (2015)

programme.title: The Last Castle (2001)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard (Kristen Stewart) at Guantanamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: The Road (2009)
programme.desc: A father (Viggo Mortensen) and his son (Kodi Smit-McPhee) try to keep the dream of civilization alive as they wander through a post-apocalyptic landscape.

programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.
